Title: Old British Roadsters
Plot: The team purchase old British roadsters from Jensen-Healey, Lotus, and TVR and they then take a wistful journey through the remnants of this country's sports-car industry, beginning in Norfolk and ending in Blackpool. Jeremy test drives the new Ferrari 458 Italia. Jeff Goldblum is the star in the new Reasonably Priced Car this week.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
